column2: Inspired by Dr. Fauci Gwinnett boy 11 starts campaign for quality masks for every kid
column5: I see so few really good stories about people helping others regardless of their circumstances and when I run across one I find myself tearing up with emotion.  Here is one such story that does not seem to be much but when you read it and understand how and why this young boy is doing this you too will feel that we do have every day ‘heroes.’ Malon James 11 became obsessed with face masks in the early days of the coronavirus pandemic watching children’s specials from his Gwinnett County home that featured Dr. Anthony Fauci director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases.
